changeSet.id: Add ability to set logging configuration per session
changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.createProcedure: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION set_log_configuration(logConfiguration character varying) RETURNS void AS 'com.chiralbehaviors.CoRE.meta.models.ModelImpl.set_log_configuration(java.lang.String)' LANGUAGE javaU IMMUTABLE COST 100;
